translations: 避开，挡开；回避（难题、批评等）；自谋生计，照顾自己

sentences.sentence: Healthy trees are also better able to fend off insects.
sentences.translation: 健康的树木也能更好地抵御昆虫的侵害。

sentences.sentence: Healthy trees are also better able to fend off bark beetle.
sentences.translation: 健康的树木也能更好地抵御树皮甲虫。

sentences.sentence: Therefore, everyone needs to fend their extra—their unique value contribution that makes them stand out in whatever is their field of employment.
sentences.translation: 因此，每个人都需要保护他们的附加价值——使他们在各领域的就业中脱颖而出作出贡献的独特价值。
